newsitem.title: JAPAN: Kobe rubber futures mixed in after-hours trade.
newsitem.headline: Kobe rubber futures mixed in after-hours trade.

text.p: Kobe rubber futures were mixed in the after-hours session on Wednesday as buying in distant months supported the market, traders said.
Prices ranged from 0.5 yen per kilogram lower to 0.1 yen firmer than the day's close. Benchmark April contract was 0.1 yen firmer at 144.1 yen. Volume was 5,796 lots.

During the day, prices extended gains in the afternoon session, buoyed by the yen's fall against the dollar and reports that Japan's rubber stocks at the end of October declined. "Eased concerns over the rubber stocks encouraged sentiment," one trader said.
